revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=FriendlyARM |model=NanoPi R4 |revision=S (4GB) |asin=B08PV4228F |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |availability=currently shipping |price=55 |est_release_date=12/2020 |type=single-board computer, router |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=USB (Type-C) Female |cpu1_brand=Rockchip |cpu1_model=RK3399 |cpu1_cspeed=2.0 GHz |cpu1_cores=6 |fla1=0 |ram1=4 GiB |ram1_brand=NetSol |ram1_model=S5RG2G20CMS-CGCJ |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 (pins), USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=3 |serial=yes,, 3-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (1500000 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8211E |eth_chip3_brand=Realtek |eth_chip3_model=RTL8111H |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2K I2C EEPROM;Microchip;24AA025E48T-I/OT;;1;,,, 300mA CMOS LDO Regulator;Richtek;RT9193;;4;,,, 300mA, 0.9V CMOS LDO Regulator;Toshiba;TCR3UM09A;;1;,,, 3A, 1.2MHz Synchronous Step-Down Switcher;MPS;MP2143;;1;,,, 5.5V, 2A Low Loss Power Distribution Switch;Silergy;SY6280;;2;,,, 5.5V, 6A, 2.4MHz Synchronous Step Down Regulator;Silergy;SYR837;;1;,,, 5.5V, 6A, 2.4MHz Synchronous Step Down Regulator;Silergy;SYR838;;1;,,, 1A, 1.5MHz PWM Step-Down DC/DC Converter;Richtek;RT8059;;1;,,, 1A, 1.5MHz PWM Step-Down DC/DC Converter;Richtek;RT8010;;2;,,, Power Management IC w/ RTC;Rockchip;RK808-D;;1; |flags=MicroSD Card slot, RTC, SPI, I2C |stock_boot=U-Boot;2017.09; |stock_os=Linux;5.15.11;Ubuntu Core 20.04; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt, Armbian, DietPi |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=pi |default_pass=pi }} {{TagLine|Single-board Computer}} :[https://www.friendlyelec.com/index.php?route=product/product&path=69&product_id=284 Product page]
"NanoPi", "R4S", "(4GB)" and "2103" are silk-screened on bottom of board.
{{See also|List of Single-board computers}}
===Links=== *[https://wiki.friendlyelec.com/wiki/index.php/NanoPi_R4S ''NanoPi R4S'' on '''FriendlyARM''' Wiki] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2020/11/12/nanopi-r4s-headless-rk3399-sbc-features-up-to-4gb-ram-dual-gigabit-ethernet-usb-3-0-ports/ ''NanoPi R4S headless RK3399 SBC'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2020/12/01/buy-nanopi-r4s-sbc-optional-metal-case/ ''NanoPi R4S SBC launched with optional metal case'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/headless-nanopi-combines-rk3399-with-dual-gbe-ports/ ''Headless NanoPi combines RK3399 with dual GbE ports'' on '''LinuxGizmos''']
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: '[[Rockchip]] RK3399 @2.0GHz Dual-Core ARM (Cortex-A72) :+ @1.4GHz Quad-Core ARM (Cortex-A53) *Storage: TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card slot *Memory: 4GB (LPDDR4) SDRAM *Network: 2x Gigabit Ethernet ports *USB: 2x USB 3.0, 1x USB 2.0 ports via pin headers *GPIO: 2x 5-pin headers *Power Source: 5V/3A via USB (Type-C)
{{WikiDevi.Wi-Cat.RU:Network/NanoPi models}}
